languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer, each dealing 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Blade Dance is a melee {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack that does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

traits.locale_text:
Reaper makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} melee attacks, each dealing 50% of the normal attack damage. Those attacks target random targets adjacent to the Reaper (including allies). Blade Dance is a melee burst attack that does not count towards the limit of attacks per turn.
This ability can only be used with a sword. If the reaper has two swords equipped, the Reaper will do {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} of the attacks with each sword.

The Bladedancer makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} melee attacks, each dealing 50% of the normal damage, against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer. Blade Dance is a melee burst attack that does not count toward the attack limit per turn. This ability can only be used with a sword in hand. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

The Bladedancer makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} melee attacks, each dealing 50% of the normal damage, against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer. Blade Dance is a melee burst attack that does not count toward the attack limit per turn. This ability can only be used with a sword in hand. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

The Bladedancer makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} melee attacks against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer, each dealing 50% of their normal damage. Blade Dance is a melee burst attack that does not count toward the attack limit per turn. This ability can only be used with a sword equipped. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer, each dealing 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Blade Dance is a melee {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack that does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer, each dealing 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Blade Dance is a melee {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack that does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

languages.text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} realiza {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra objetivos aleatorios (incluyendo aliados) adyacentes a él. Cada uno de ellos inflige un 50 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} normal. Danza de espada es un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} que no cuenta para el límite de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo se puede usar con una espada equipada. Si tiene dos espadas equipadas, el hoja danzante realiza {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} ataques con cada una.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer, each dealing 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Blade Dance is a melee {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack that does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

traits.locale_text: El {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} realiza {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ataques cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} contra objetivos aleatorios (incluyendo aliados) adyacentes a él. Cada uno de ellos inflige un 50 % de su {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} normal. Danza de espada es un ataque cuerpo a cuerpo de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} que no cuenta para el límite de ataques por {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Esta {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} solo se puede usar con una espada equipada. Si tiene dos espadas equipadas, el hoja danzante realiza {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} ataques con cada una.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は、自分に隣接するランダムなターゲット（味方を含む）に対して、それぞれ通常{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の50%で{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を{uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}回行う。ブレード・ダンスは近接{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃で、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとの攻撃制限にカウントされない。 この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は剣装備時のみ使用できる。剣を2本装備している場合、ブレードダンサーはそれぞれの剣で{uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}回ずつ攻撃する。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer, each dealing 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Blade Dance is a melee {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack that does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}は、自分に隣接するランダムなターゲット（味方を含む）に対して、それぞれ通常{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}の50%で{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}を{uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}回行う。ブレード・ダンスは近接{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃で、1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}ごとの攻撃制限にカウントされない。 この{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}は剣装備時のみ使用できる。剣を2本装備している場合、ブレードダンサーはそれぞれの剣で{uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}回ずつ攻撃する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}对邻近随机目标（包括盟友在内）进行{uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，每次攻击造成正常{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的50%。利刃之舞视为近战{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击，不计入每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}攻击次数限制。 此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能在装备长剑的情况下使用。如果刀锋舞者装备了两把长剑，则会分别使用每把长剑进行{uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}次攻击。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer, each dealing 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Blade Dance is a melee {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack that does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}对邻近随机目标（包括盟友在内）进行{uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}次{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}，每次攻击造成正常{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}的50%。利刃之舞视为近战{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击，不计入每{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}攻击次数限制。 此{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}只能在装备长剑的情况下使用。如果刀锋舞者装备了两把长剑，则会分别使用每把长剑进行{uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d}次攻击。

languages.text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} effectue {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} contre des cibles aléatoires (y compris ses alliés) adjacentes, chacune infligeant 50 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} normaux. Danse des Lames est une attaque de mêlée en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} qui n'est pas prise en considération dans la limite d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut être utilisée qu'avec une épée. Si le danselame manie deux épées, il inflige {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attaques par épée.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer, each dealing 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Blade Dance is a melee {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack that does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

traits.locale_text: Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} effectue {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaques de mêlée{/g} contre des cibles aléatoires (y compris ses alliés) adjacentes, chacune infligeant 50 % de ses {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} normaux. Danse des Lames est une attaque de mêlée en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} qui n'est pas prise en considération dans la limite d'attaques par {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}. Cette {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ne peut être utilisée qu'avec une épée. Si le danselame manie deux épées, il inflige {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attaques par épée.

languages.text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} führt {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} gegen zufällige Ziele (einschließlich Verbündete) aus, die an den Klingentänzer angrenzen, wobei jeder 50 % seines normalen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} verursacht. Klingentanz ist ein Nahkampf-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Bündelangriff{/g}, der nicht in das Angriffslimit pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} einfließt. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur eingesetzt werden, wenn ein Schwert ausgerüstet ist. Sind zwei Schwerter ausgerüstet, führt der Klingentänzer {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} Angriffe pro Schwert aus.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer, each dealing 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Blade Dance is a melee {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack that does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} führt {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangriffe{/g} gegen zufällige Ziele (einschließlich Verbündete) aus, die an den Klingentänzer angrenzen, wobei jeder 50 % seines normalen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} verursacht. Klingentanz ist ein Nahkampf-{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Bündel{/g}angriff, der nicht in das Angriffslimit pro {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} einfließt. Diese {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} kann nur eingesetzt werden, wenn ein Schwert ausgerüstet ist. Sind zwei Schwerter ausgerüstet, führt der Klingentänzer {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} Angriffe pro Schwert aus.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} совершает {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} атаки в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} против случайных целей (включая союзников) на соседних клетках. Каждый удар наносит половину обычного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Танец клинков – это атака {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} в ближнем бою, которая не входит в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} может использоваться только с мечом. Если у танцора смерти два меча, каждым из них он наносит {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} удара.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer, each dealing 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Blade Dance is a melee {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack that does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} совершает {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} атак в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} против случайных целей (включая союзников) на соседних клетках. Каждый удар наносит половину обычного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Танец клинков – это атака {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} в ближнем бою, которая не входит в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} может использоваться только с мечом. Если у танцора смерти два меча, каждым из них он наносит {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} ударов.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Танцор смерти{/g} совершает {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} атак в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} против случайных целей (включая союзников) на соседних клетках. Каждый удар наносит половину обычного {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}. Танец клинков – это атака {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} в ближнем бою, которая не входит в лимит атак на {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Эта {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} может использоваться только с мечом. Если у танцора смерти два меча, каждым из них он наносит {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} ударов.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, kendisine bitişik duran (dost birimler de dâhil) rastgele hedeflere {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} kadar {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}yakın dövüş saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirir. Her bir saldırı, normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasarın{/g} %50'sini verir. Kılıç Dansı, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tur{/g} başına saldırı sınırından sayılmayan bir {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri{/g} yakın dövüş saldırısıdır. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} yalnızca kılıç kuşanılmışsa kullanılabilir. Kılıç Dansçısı, aynı anda iki kılıç kuşanmışsa her biriyle {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} kadar saldırı gerçekleştirir.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} makes {uip|Attacks|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}melee attacks{/g} against random targets (including allies) adjacent to the Bladedancer, each dealing 50% of their normal {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}. Blade Dance is a melee {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack that does not count toward the attack limit per {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} can only be used with a sword equipped. If two swords are equipped, the Bladedancer makes {uip|DualAttack|e955823f54d24088ae1fdefe88d3684d} attacks with each one.
